items.title: Firewall management
items.solution:
Firewall commands:
- ufw status: Check UFW status
- ufw allow 80: Allow port 80
- firewall-cmd --list-all: List firewalld rules

items.title: SSL certificate setup
items.solution:
Setup SSL with Let's Encrypt:
- certbot --nginx: Auto-configure Nginx
- certbot certonly: Get certificate only
- certbot renew: Renew certificates
